@@ -59,1 +59,1 @@
-     * Launch debuggee on local host.
+     * Launch debuggee.
@@ -62,1 +62,1 @@
-        launcher.display("Starting local debuggee.");
+        launcher.display("Starting debuggee.");

@@ -34,2 +34,2 @@ - * This class provides launching of jdb and debuggee in local - * or remote mode according to test command line options. + * This class provides launching of jdb and debuggee + * according to test command line options. @@ -100,1 +100,1 @@ - * and debuggee in defined mode. + * and debuggee. @@ -107,1 +107,1 @@ - localDefaultLaunch(jdbCmdArgs, classToExecute); + defaultLaunch(jdbCmdArgs, classToExecute); @@ -109,1 +109,1 @@ - localRawLaunch(jdbCmdArgs, classToExecute); + rawLaunch(jdbCmdArgs, classToExecute); @@ -111,1 +111,1 @@ - localLaunch(jdbCmdArgs, classToExecute); + launchFromJdb(jdbCmdArgs, classToExecute); @@ -113,1 +113,1 @@ - localLaunchAndAttach(jdbCmdArgs, classToExecute); + launchAndAttach(jdbCmdArgs, classToExecute); @@ -115,1 +115,1 @@ - localLaunchAndListen(jdbCmdArgs, classToExecute); + launchAndListen(jdbCmdArgs, classToExecute); @@ -117,1 +117,1 @@ - throw new TestBug("Unexpected connector type for local launch mode" + throw new TestBug("Unexpected connector type: " @@ -258,1 +258,1 @@ - * Run test in local mode using default connector. + * Run test using default connector. @@ -260,1 +260,1 @@ - private void localDefaultLaunch + private void defaultLaunch @@ -262,1 +262,1 @@ - localLaunch(jdbCmdArgs, classToExecute); + launchFromJdb(jdbCmdArgs, classToExecute); @@ -266,1 +266,1 @@ - * Run test in local mode using raw launching connector. + * Run test using raw launching connector. @@ -268,1 +268,1 @@ - private void localRawLaunch + private void rawLaunch @@ -270,1 +270,1 @@ - localLaunch(jdbCmdArgs, classToExecute); + launchFromJdb(jdbCmdArgs, classToExecute); @@ -274,1 +274,1 @@ - * Run test in local mode using launching connector. + * Run test using launching connector. @@ -276,1 +276,1 @@ - private void localLaunch + private void launchFromJdb @@ -280,1 +280,1 @@ - display("Starting jdb launching local debuggee"); + display("Starting jdb launching debuggee"); @@ -290,1 +290,1 @@ - * Run test in local mode using attaching connector. + * Run test using attaching connector. @@ -292,1 +292,1 @@ - private void localLaunchAndAttach + private void launchAndAttach @@ -300,1 +300,1 @@ - display("Start jdb attaching to local debuggee"); + display("Starting jdb attaching to debuggee"); @@ -306,1 +306,1 @@ - * Run test in local mode using listening connector. + * Run test using listening connector. @@ -308,1 +308,1 @@ - private void localLaunchAndListen + private void launchAndListen @@ -312,1 +312,1 @@ - display("Starting jdb listening to local debuggee"); + display("Starting jdb listening to debuggee");

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@

@@ -477,8 +477,0 @@
-/*
-        if (! isLaunchedLocally() && ! isDefaultJVMDIStrictMode()) {
-            throw new BadOption("inconsistent options: "
-                                + "-launch.mode=" + getLaunchMode()
-                                + " and -jvmdi.strict=" + getJVMDIStrictMode());
-        }
- */
